document.full_text: dorothy parvaz, a reporter for al jazeera's english-language web site who was arrested in syria last month and then held in iran until wednesday, described her detention in a television interview following her release.
document.title: the lede: reporter describes captivity in syria
lines_and_colors: dorothy parvaz, a reporter for al jazeera's english-language web site who was arrested in syria last month and then held in iran until wednesday, described her detention in a television interview following her release.
